New Records: Denmark's remarkable streak of clean sheets in friendly home games may cease to exist by the close of play on Wednesday
Pre-Game Insights: Sweden's shoddy Euro 2024 qualifying performance says little about the individual quality of Tomasson's troops - especially in the final third
Denmark's remarkable streak of clean sheets in friendly home games may cease to exist by the close of play on Wednesday
Post-Match Reflections: Hjulmand's men should strike back themselves to edge it
Miscellaneous Highlights: Denmark pipped their counterparts to the first-placed post by virtue of a superior head-to-head record
Sweden will not be present at the European Championships for the first time since 1996 this summer
Tomasson was given a baptism of fire on his first assignment, a 5-2 beating at the hands of Portugal on March 21
